newsitem.title: UK: UK meals/feeds closed firmer, could rise Thursday.
newsitem.headline: UK meals/feeds closed firmer, could rise Thursday.

text.p: UK meals and feed closed firmer as it continued to track the Chicago soybean meal futures, with further gains thought likely on Thursday.

Early trading gains in Chicago were caused by harsh weather in the U.S. midwest crop growing region and talk that China had purchased 50,000 tonnes of soybeans and was looking for another 50,000 tonnes.
The gains in the UK and the prospect of more to come coupled with continuing currency uncertainty, left traders unwilling to complete any business transactions.
